title: Develop AKS Terraform Module with CNI & RBAC
description: Create Terraform configuration for Azure Kubernetes Service including Azure CNI networking, Azure AD RBAC integration, and Node Pools setup.
sprint_goal: Establish Core Infrastructure and Backend Foundations
acceptance_criteria: Terraform plan passes; AKS cluster provisions; kubectl connectivity verified
definition_of_done: Code in repo; Pipeline passing; Environment reachable

title: Provision PostgreSQL with PostGIS & TimescaleDB
description: Configure Azure Database for PostgreSQL Flexible Server with required extensions for geospatial and time-series data.
sprint_goal: Establish Core Infrastructure and Backend Foundations
acceptance_criteria: PostgreSQL running; PostGIS active; TimescaleDB active
definition_of_done: DB Accessible from AKS; Extensions verified
deployment_notes: Ensure firewall rules allow AKS subnet

title: Configure Reusable Workflow for Microservices
description: Create parameterized GitHub Action workflow for Docker build, scan, and Helm deploy.
sprint_goal: Establish Core Infrastructure and Backend Foundations
acceptance_criteria: Workflow builds sample service; Pushes to ACR; Deploys to AKS

title: Develop Product Registration API Endpoint
description: Implement POST /products endpoint in NestJS with UTC warranty expiry calculation using date-fns.
sprint_goal: Establish Core Infrastructure and Backend Foundations
acceptance_criteria: API accepts payload; Calculates expiry (UTC); Validates regex; Persists to DB
definition_of_done: Unit tests passed; Integration test against DB passed

title: Implement Geospatial Routing Service
description: Develop NestJS service to execute PostGIS 'ST_Contains' queries matching user location to Service Center polygons.
sprint_goal: Establish Core Infrastructure and Backend Foundations
acceptance_criteria: Identifies correct SC polygon; Handles overlaps; P95 < 250ms
definition_of_done: Performance test passed with complex polygons
deployment_notes: Monitor DB CPU during spatial queries

title: Develop SignalR Location Hub
description: Create ASP.NET Core SignalR Hub with Azure SignalR Service and JWT auth for real-time streaming.
sprint_goal: Establish Core Infrastructure and Backend Foundations
acceptance_criteria: Hub accepts stream; Broadcasts to group; Latency < 2s

title: Implement Offline Action Queue Architecture
description: Set up WatermelonDB/Redux Offline structure for mobile app to handle disconnected states.
sprint_goal: Establish Core Infrastructure and Backend Foundations
acceptance_criteria: Actions persist restart; Execute in order; Retry logic works

title: Integrate Mapbox GL JS Polygon Editor
description: Create React component wrapping Mapbox GL JS Draw to allow admins to define service areas.
sprint_goal: Establish Core Infrastructure and Backend Foundations
acceptance_criteria: Draw/edit polygons; Validate closure; Export GeoJSON

title: Implement Background Location Service
description: Configure 'react-native-background-geolocation' and connect to SignalR hub for tracking.
acceptance_criteria: Tracks in background; Sends to Hub; Permission handling
definition_of_done: Field test successful on iOS and Android
deployment_notes: Requires correct App Store permissions descriptions

title: Implement OCR Worker with Polly Resilience
description: Develop .NET BackgroundService to consume invoice images and call Azure AI.
acceptance_criteria: Processes Service Bus messages; Retries on failure; Circuit breaker
definition_of_done: Integration test with mocked Azure AI
